file.name: swagger-api_communcations.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Swagger Cloudtrust Communications
  description: 'Communications API for Cloudtrust'
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
- url: http://localhost:8888/communications
tags:
- name: Email
  description: Send Emails
- name: SMS
  description: Send SMS
paths:
  /actions:
    get:
      tags:
      - Actions
      summary: Get the list of all possible actions
      responses:
        200:
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Actions'
  /realms/{realm}/send-mail:
    post:
      tags:
      - Email
      summary: Send an email to a user
      parameters:
      - name: realm
        in: path
        description: realm name (not id!)
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/EmailRepresentation'
      responses:
        200:
          description: successful operation
  /realms/{realm}/send-sms:
    post:
      tags:
      - SMS
      summary: Send SMS to the user
      parameters:
      - name: realm
        in: path
        description: realm name (not id!)
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SMSRepresentation'
      responses:
        200:
          description: successful operation

components:
  schemas:
    Actions:
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        scope:
          type: string
    EmailRepresentation:
      type: object
      properties:
        recipient:
          type: string
        theming:
          type: object
          properties:
            subjectKey:
              type: string
            subjectParameters:
              type: array
              items:
                type: string
            template:
              type: string
            templateParameters:
              type: object
            locale:
              type: string
        attachments:
          type: object
          properties:
            filename:
              type: string
            contentType:
              type: string
            content:
              type: string
    SMSRepresentation:
      type: object
      properties:
        msisdn:
          type: string
        theming:
          type: object
          properties:
            messageKey:
              type: string
            messageParameters:
              type: array
              items:
                type: string
            locale:
              type: string
  securitySchemes:
    openId:
      type: openIdConnect
      openIdConnectUrl: http://toto.com/.well-known/openid-configuration
security:
  - openId:
    - todo

Error: notImplemented: path "/actions": get: security: security "openId" (index 0): oauth2 security not implemented
